name: jugitube-download-backend
description: Optional backend service for AnomTube extension - handles video/audio downloads via yt-dlp

scripts.test: echo "Download test: curl -X POST http://localhost:3000/api/download -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{\"url\": \"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dQw4w9WgXcQ\", \"format\": \"mp3\", \"quality\": \"medium\"}'"

author: AnomFIN
